name: Typewise
headline: Boosting customer service and sales productivity by 2-3x.
description: Typewise develops text prediction software for customer service and sales teams. Our enterprise clients such as DPD (a Fortune 500 logistics company) use Typewise to communicate with their customers faster and more effectively.

founders.name: David Eberle, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO at Typewise, formerly Engagement Manager at Booz & Company. Lived in 7+ countries.

founders.name: Janis Berneker, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CTO at Typewise, formerly Lead Data Science at Swiss National Broadcaster SRF. Loves coding since he was a kid. Speaks 5+ languages.

## Excellent customer service at scale
Maximize customer satisfaction
AI-assisted response with your company’s tone, increasing Customer Satisfaction Score and Net Promoter Score.
Increase efficiency by 50%
Reduce Average Handling Time, enhance First Time Resolution rates, and speed up Response Times.
Achieve3-5X ROI
Boost operational efficiency and customer engagement to reduce costs and increase revenue.
[Calculate your ROI](https://typewise.app/</roi-calculator>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66712aa64e8177accb8cd75c/6673a7804ef90dbed2af51e4_Ellipse%2016.svg)
## Deliver top quality with your own AI
Typewise Custom AI
Leverage your data to deliver tailored, multilingual, and accurate communication to your customers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66712aa64e8177accb8cd75c/66921f0673f47ae1b57b5b36_Frame%201597879777.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66712aa64e8177accb8cd75c/6673a88c3bc3b8daa9588349_Ellipse%2017.svg)
## Take productivity to the next level
[Magic Reply](https://typewise.app/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Text Prediction](https://typewise.app/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Message Optimizer](https://typewise.app/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Real-time Translation](https://typewise.app/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Grammar & Spell Check](https://typewise.app/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)[Insights Hub](https://typewise.app/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-5>)
Magic Reply
Auto-generate email and chat responses based on past messages, knowledge base, and communication rules.
![Magic reply video example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66712aa64e8177accb8cd75c/6707afda8ab5317ccd2777d4_typewise-magicreplay-2.gif)
Text Prediction
Auto-complete entire sentences and paragraphs in real-time.
![text prediction typewise example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66712aa64e8177accb8cd75c/6707ee507967ce1207335dc4_typewise-textprediction.gif)
Message Optimizer
Improve conversations to match your communication standards and guidelines.
![message optimizer Typewise example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66712aa64e8177accb8cd75c/6707afd94c9558a2c6201824_typewise-messageoptimizer.gif)
Real-time Translation
Automatically translate incoming messages and responses into 26+ languages.
![Real time translation Typewise example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66712aa64e8177accb8cd75c/6707afd93ce6f76b01ddc1f3_typewise-Real-timetranslation_1.gif)
Grammar & Spelling Check
Instantly correct grammar and spelling mistakes for flawless communication.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66712aa64e8177accb8cd75c/6707eda71427b65b45f32805_typewise-grammerspellcheck.gif)
Insights Hub
Monitor quality and performance in real-time at company, team, and agent levels.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66712aa64e8177accb8cd75c/6707afd98eead12a833ea1fa_typewise-insightshub.gif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66712aa64e8177accb8cd75c/66c0e3741121c5920206f998_neural.avif)
Connect your knowledge base
Integrate various data sources to ensure that Typewise generates responses that are always up-to date with your product information, business processes, etc.
Segment per brand, team or channel
Leverage sub-models for your different brands, teams, or communication channels to ensure content and tone of voice consistency.
Learn from your best agents
Enhance overall quality and customer satisfaction by allowing Typewise to learn from your top-performing agents.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66712aa64e8177accb8cd75c/66987d5e7480615b1efc5f0a_pexels-googledeepmind-17485657.avif)
Connect your knowledge base
Integrate various data sources to ensure that Typewise generates responses that are always up-todate with your product information, business processes, etc.
Segment per brand, team or channel
Leverage sub-models for your different brands, teams, or communication channels to ensure content and tone of voice consistency.
Learn from your best agents
Enhance overall quality and customer satisfaction by allowing Typewise to learn from your top-performing agents.

## Excellent customer service at scale
Maximize customer satisfaction
AI-assisted response with your company’s tone, increasing Customer Satisfaction Score and Net Promoter Score.
Increase efficiency by 50%
Reduce Average Handling Time, enhance First Time Resolution rates, and speed up Response Times.
Achieve3-5X ROI
Boost operational efficiency and customer engagement to reduce costs and increase revenue.
Calculate your ROI⟨14⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66712aa64e8177accb8cd75c/6673a7804ef90dbed2af51e4_Ellipse%2016.svg)
## Deliver top quality with your own AI
Typewise Custom AI
Leverage your data to deliver tailored, multilingual, and accurate communication to your customers.

generated_description:
**Typewise: Redefining Customer Service with AI**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from Zürich, Switzerland, Typewise has emerged as a pivotal player in the realm of customer service productivity. The company's mission? To boost customer service and sales productivity by 2-3 times. Sounds ambitious? That’s how you get ahead in today’s competitive landscape.

Initially developed as text prediction software, Typewise has evolved into a robust AI Communication Assistant tailored specifically for customer service and sales teams. Their software is already trusted by enterprise clients like DPD, a Fortune 500 logistics giant, which utilizes Typewise to enhance their communication effectiveness and speed.

Part of the Y Combinator Batch S22, Typewise is built on a core understanding of the business landscape—where time is money and communication efficiency can define customer satisfaction. With a small but dynamic team of 12, Typewise is leaning heavily on machine learning and AI to transform how businesses interact with their customers.

### What They Offer

At its heart, Typewise provides tools to automate and optimize customer interactions. Some of the standout features include:

- **Magic Reply**: Auto-generates responses to emails and chats based on past communication and internal knowledge, helping teams respond faster effortlessly.
- **Text Prediction**: Enables real-time completion of sentences and paragraphs—essentially, it helps you write faster.
- **Message Optimizer**: Ensures conversations align with company standards, enhancing coherence and professionalism.
- **Real-time Translation**: Allows seamless communication across multiple languages, making it easier for global teams to connect with customers.
- **Insights Hub**: Provides performance metrics at various levels, helping businesses understand the quality and efficiency of their service.

### Outcomes That Speak Volumes

Typewise is not just about promises; it’s about results. Clients have experienced significant increases in efficiency—over 25% in some cases. For instance, DPD's project manager noted how they dramatically improved handling multiple customer inquiries without sacrificing quality.

### Why Typewise?

- **Speedy Deployment**: Typewise touts rapid deployment times of just 1-2 days, making it an attractive option for companies looking to integrate new technologies without long lead times.
- **GDPR Compliant and ISO Certified**: Trust and security are paramount, and Typewise has its bases covered.
- **Zero-Risk Pilot Program**: Businesses can test out Typewise solutions without upfront commitments, minimizing investment fears.

In a world where every moment counts, Typewise stands at the intersection of AI and customer service, providing tools that not only save time but also enhance the overall customer experience. For teams looking to perform at their best while delivering top-notch service, Typewise is indeed worth a closer look.

For more insights and a demo, you can check out their website: [Typewise](https://typewise.app).
